Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Kallikrates. Shape of handle and length of stamp suggest the date. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0147.34.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (107)
